胦字的基本解释

胦
yāng
〔脖胦〕肚脐，如“肓之原出于胦胦。”
〔胦肛〕不伏人。

胦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yāng］
［《廣韻》於良切，平陽，影。］
见“脖胦”。

胦字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　胦； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页980第09
【廣韻】握江切【集韻】於江切，?音?。胦肛，不伏人。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?於良切，音央。【廣韻】脬胦。【集韻】脖胦，臍也。　又【集韻】於郞切，音鴦。又倚朗切，音坱。義?同。

胦字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
胦字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
yāng
〔Neck 胦〕The belly button, as in "The origin of the 肓 is from the 肓胦."
〔胦Anus〕 It's not uncomfortable.
Yin

[①]［yāng］
["Guangyun" Yu Liangqie, Pingyang, Shadow. ]
See "neck pan".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Department of meat characters] 　胦; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: Page 980 09
[Guang Yun] Holding Jiang Qi [Ji Yun] Yu Jiang Qi, "Yin". The anus of the pelvic anus is not uncomfortable.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Liangqie, Yin Yang. [Guangyun] 脬覦. 【Jiyun】Neck and navel.　[Jiyun] Yu Yunqie, Yinyang. Relying on Langche again, Yin Tuo. Righteous? Same.
